Activities commonly implemented under this intervention

Assess and fill capacity gaps in relevant government ministries.
Develop early warning and decision support systems and tools.

Guidance for increased environmental sustainability

P7. Support the establishment of a livestock and environment unit within the ministry of agriculture/livestock. Provide technical assistance and capacity building on environmental planning, monitoring, and extension in livestock production. WB 2009.
P7. Provide relevant ministries (e.g., agriculture, livestock, water, environment, rural development, finance, energy) with capacity building on livestock and environment issues.
